text: (sakat namæti) danamanaya nam, dilindantada, duppatuntada, sakat ekkasu karannantada, alutin islamaya vælanda gat ayatada, vahalunva nidahas kirimatada, naya baren miriki sitina ayatada, allahge margayehi yuddha kala ayatada, mægiyantada, (ayiti dæya vasayen) allah niyama kara æti anivayadæya yutukamaki. allah (siyalla) itamat dænuvatva ha gnanavantayeku vasayen sitinneya
